state_analysis: The FastText binary appears not to be executing properly, as all attempts to run the training command yield the same output indicating available arguments instead of starting the training process. This may be due to an issue with the command structure or the input file format.
explanation: To troubleshoot this effectively, we will start by checking the format and content of 'yelp_data_formatted.txt' to ensure it adheres to the expected structure for FastText. We will also try to run the FastText command without any arguments to confirm that the binary is functioning correctly. After these checks, we will attempt to train the model again with a clearer command format.
